Description.Details:
The midtier rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM4s deal good damage for comparatively few negatives other than their inherently short range and need for ammunition. As for all SRMs, SRM4 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. The Streak Missile Launcher is a specialized version of the standard Short Range Missile launcher which withholds fire until it receives a solid lock ensuring all missiles will hit. If the launcher cannot gain a lock on the target the missiles won't fire.

Unlike other missile systems, Streak based weaponry does not suffer from a Missile accuracy modifier.
